mechanic.name: Bounty - Armor Break
mechanic.desc: Each Resilience Break inflicted on the boss by your squad grants <color=#ec6d21>400</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>5</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>2,000</color> points.

mechanic.name: Stellnanite Berserk
mechanic.desc:
The boss starts with 1 stack of Berserk and gains 1 stack every 10s (up to 5 stacks). Each stack increases the boss' DMG by <color=#ec6d21>20%</color>.
Dealing 10 hits to the boss within 2s removes all Berserk stacks. The main Trekker then gains 10 stacks of Amplify (up to 10 stacks). Each hit dealt consumes 1 Amplify stack to increase that hit's DMG by <color=#ec6d21>50%</color>.

mechanic.name: Bounty - Wind Dodger
mechanic.desc: Whenever a boss casts a skill that triggers Tornado, dodging the Tornado grants <color=#ec6d21>450</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>12</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>5,400</color> points.

mechanic.name: Stellnanite Berserk
mechanic.desc:
The boss starts with 1 stack of Berserk and gains 1 stack every 10s (up to 5 stacks). Each stack increases the boss' DMG by <color=#ec6d21>20%</color>.
Dealing 10 hits to the boss within 2s removes all Berserk stacks. The main Trekker then gains 10 stacks of Amplify (up to 10 stacks). Each hit dealt consumes 1 Amplify stack to increase that hit's DMG by <color=#ec6d21>50%</color>.

mechanic.name: Bounty - Knife Destroyer
mechanic.desc: Each Blade thrown by the boss and destroyed by allies grants <color=#ec6d21>180</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>30</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>5,400</color> points.

mechanic.name: Pyro Blight
mechanic.desc:
The boss gains a Fire Ring, increasing their DMG dealt by <color=#ec6d21>30%</color> and continuously dealing DMG to your squad within the ring.
Triggering 3 Elemental Marks on the boss within 5s grants the squad Enhancement, increasing Auto Attack DMG by <color=#ec6d21>30%</color> for 10s, and disables the boss' Fire Ring for 10s.

mechanic.name: Bounty - Weed Killer
mechanic.desc: Whenever a boss summons monsters, each monster that survives for less than 10s grants 600 Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>5</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>3,000</color> points.

mechanic.name: Stellnanite Berserk
mechanic.desc:
The boss starts with 1 stack of Berserk and gains 1 stack every 10s (up to 5 stacks). Each stack increases the boss' DMG by <color=#ec6d21>20%</color>.
Dealing 10 hits to the boss within 2s removes all Berserk stacks. The main Trekker then gains 10 stacks of Amplify (up to 10 stacks). Each hit dealt consumes 1 Amplify stack to increase that hit's DMG by <color=#ec6d21>50%</color>.

mechanic.name: Bounty - Knife Recycler
mechanic.desc: Each Blade thrown and then retrieved by the boss grants <color=#ec6d21>75 Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>40</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>3,000</color> points.

Triggering 3 Elemental Marks on the boss within 5s grants the squad Enhancement, increasing Auto Attack DMG by <color=#ec6d21>30%</color> for 10s, and disables the boss' Fire Ring for 10s.

mechanic.name: Bounty: Dodging Fissures
mechanic.desc: Whenever a boss casts a skill that triggers Ground Fissure, dodging the Ground Fissure grants <color=#ec6d21>100</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>30</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>3,000</color> points.

mechanic.name: Bounty - Combo
mechanic.desc: Dealing continuous DMG to a boss for 5s by your squad grants <color=#ec6d21>100</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>20</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>2,000</color> points.
